column3: Pray pay me no mind, <If(PlayerParameter(4))>miss<Else/>sir</If>. I am but a humble trader charged with purchasing unwanted gear procured by adventurers in the Diadem.

I beg your pardon, <If(PlayerParameter(4))>miss<Else/>sir</If>, but do you perchance have any equipment from the Diadem? No? Well, should any come into your possession, know that I will gladly purchase them.
I don't suppose you've got any trinkets from the Diadem on you, do you? Didn't think so. If you know anyone who's got some, let them know I'm buying, would you?

You strike me as an adventurous sort. On the off chance your adventures lead you to the Diadem, you might stumble upon a certain variety of gear─you'll know it when you see it, believe you me. Bring it here and I'll see you properly compensated.

Hail to you, good <If(PlayerParameter(4))>madam<Else/>sir</If>. I am a collector of rare equipment, specifically those found in the Diadem. If you bring me such articles, I will furnish you with suitable recompense.
